name: Gill Dorado
background: Gillbert Dorado, known as Gill by his friends & associates, is a brillient vedalken alchemist who wastes his time searching out and studying paranormal activity in the various locales of [setting]. Gill takes meticulous care in being prepared for any scenario; his armor is covered in pouches, straps, clips and other utility features. He carries some advanced alchemical tools and many flasks with mysterious liquid. He is roughly 6ft tall and wears night vision goggles

racialAbilities.name: Vedalken Dispassion
racialAbilities.description: Advantage on ST for INT, WIS and CHA

racialAbilities.name: Tireless Precision
racialAbilities.description: Gain Proficiency with Medicine, Theives' Tools. Add 1d4 to rolls with this tools

racialAbilities.name: Partially Amphibious
racialAbilities.description: Can breath underwater for 1 hour, once per long rest

classItems.name: Scale Mail
classItems.note: covered in pockets for potions, tools, gadgets etc

classItems.name: Goggles of Night
classItems.note: wonderous item, made with Artificer's Replicate infusion

classItems.name: Rope of Climbing
classItems.note: wonderous item, made with Artificer's Replicate infusion

classAbilities.name: Magical Tinkering
classAbilities.description: Make Fart Rocks and Other Cool Stuff

classAbilities.name: Spellcasting
classAbilities.description: See Spell page, must use Artificer's or Theives' Tools

classAbilities.name: Infuse Item
classAbilities.description: Gain the ability to learn infusions. 4 immediately. See Infusion table for those known & the rules

classAbilities.name: ALCH: Experimental Elixers
classAbilities.description: After completing a long rest, roll 1d6 and refer to elixer table. Create elixer based on result of dice. Consume spell slots to make additional elixers.

classAbilities.name: ALCH: Alchemical Savant
classAbilities.description: When using alchemist supplies to cast spells, add INT bonus to any rolls that heal or deal damage via acid, fire, necrotic or poison

spells.name: Acid Splash
spells.description: 2d6 acid to up to 2 creatures within 5ft of target

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description: 2d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isnâ€™t being worn or carried

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.description: Target creature gains hit points equal to 1d4 + :int:. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Ray of Sickness
spells.description: Ranged Spell Attack 2d8 poison, Con. save. FAIL:poisoned

spells.name: Arcane Weapon
spells.description: Imbue weapon with acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. 1d6 damage of the chosen type

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.description: 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire, lasts for the duration. Dex. save FAIL: 2d6 fire, PASS: half. BA: move the sphere 30 feet, trigger effects.

spells.name: Melf's Acid Arrow
spells.description: Ranged Spell Attack. On a hit, 4d4 acid + 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, target takes half and no secondary damage

items.name: Scale Mail
items.note: covered in pockets for potions, tools, gadgets etc
